description:
Board: Raspberry Pi 3
CPU: 64-bit quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 running at 1.2 GHz
Connection: 802.11 b/g/n Wireless LAN
Memory: 1 GB LPDDR2
Port: 4 x USB 2.0, 1 x Ethernet, 1 x HDMI, 1 x RCA
GPIO: 40 pins
Sensor: 3 x Ultrasonic sensor HQ-04, 1 x Gas detect sensor MQ2, 1x Low voltage module
Engine: 4 x DC motor, 4 x wheel, 1 x Engine control module L298N
Battery, : 7.4V - 2000mAh (2 x 18650 battery), rechargeable
Car frame: Mica material
